item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, August 13, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trump lashes out at ‘inside’ enemies in interview with Musk
2. Russian navy trained to target sites inside Europe with nuclear-capable missiles
3. How Ukraine pulled off its biggest gamble: invading Russia
4. Ukraine’s incursion displaces more than 133,000 in Russia
5. Musk clashes with EU over X ‘disinformation’ ahead of Trump interview
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, August 13, 2024 at 11:10 AM UTC
